title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 759.11 - Confidentiality of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 759.11 - Confidentiality of records

State Regulations

The operator shall keep confidential and make available
only to authorized persons all medical, social, personal and financial
information relating to each registrant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
759.11

Adopted

New

York State Register June 14, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 24, eff. 6/14/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
